titleStmt.title: The reading Quakers vindicated from false aspersions; shewing that unneighbourly proceedings is no testimony of Christianity or real Quakers, but destructive to Christian society
titleStmt.author: Curtis, Thomas, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Reading, 19th 9th month, 1696. Thomas Curtis, William Soundey, Benjamin Coales.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
